string.name: app_detail
string.i: For more detail of this app , please click on the Help button below

resources.string:
Android App version 1.0.0 


This is alpha version of this app. it is still evolving and we are committed to making it a little better each day 


Crash reports are automatically reported back to us. 


Copyright 2016 , Rahul Goyal 
Developed by - Rahul Goyal


This is a app which helps when you are in trouble. 

How to use - 
just click 5 times on power button and it will send message to three friends which you have registered. In this message along with your help message , your current location also send to your friends.
